Posts.EditableText: As Ebersmile II (Lords of Ebersmile), is a HUGE HUGE project based around VB (Visual Basic) and ASL (Adventure Script Language), i would much appriciate it if people who are frequent members of this forum joined up on my forum to give your support and help to the project. If nobody yet knows about it, me and my friend (TheNobleOne) are coding our own client in VB. It will feature many cool stuff, like a click based system in which you can click on player images, monsters, and items to do stuff like attack, look at players, and pickup items. It's very simple as all the clicking would just send the command to the server. It's just easier than typing lots of commands. This type of Text-Based MuD is the modern style of MuD. Most are used in TelNet, and some in java, but i only know of 3 modern MuDs, and soon 4 If you signup you will see the progress with the game and the client. People on this forum get to test the game before its even released as you are members of AxeUK, and use the community frequently.
